item.title: MERCEDES 1620 1.50.x ETS2
item.description:
MERCEDES 1620 1.50.x ETS2

MERCEDES 1620
TESTED ON VERSION1.50 E 1.51
Game: Euro truck simulator 2



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Arnook’s Container Pack Edition Fix v10 ATS
item.description:
Arnook’s Container Pack Edition Fix v10 ATS

Changelog :
Fix
– Fixed a def error with the 20ft flatracks

V10 :
~First Release on the Steam Workshop~
– Mod completely adapted to game version 1.50
– Mod now packed with HashV2 method for better performance
– Added 20ft/40ft/45ft curtainsider containers (35 skins in total)
– Added the curtainsiders to the traffic
– Fixed traffic showing up default SCS containers

– Containers now present in some of the Depots, ports, and other locations on the maps (Thanks KrysEmlyn)
– AI Train Add-On updated

Features :
Full compatibility with the SCS chassis configurations (singles, doubles, etc…)
Available in the freight Market & for owned trailers
The skin-selection is made randomly by the game (same system as SCS’s original containers)
All container variants in traffic
Supports both default & custom dedicated cargos :
-> Default cargos : just use the same cargos as you usually do and the default skins will be replaced by mine
-> Dedicated cargos :search for “Box Container”/”Box Container HC”/”Reefer Container”/”Reefer Container HC”/”ISO Tank Container”/”Flatrack container”/”Open-Top container”/”Curtainsider Container”, depending on the type of container that you want

Types and Lengths included :
Standard Cube Corrugated sides : 20ft – 40ft
High Cube Corrugated sides : 20ft – 40ft – 45ft – 53ft
Open-Top : 20ft – 40ft
Standard Cube Reefers : 20ft – 40ft
High Cube Reefers : 40ft
Tanks : 20ft – 40ft
Flatracks : 20ft – 40ft – 45ft
Curtainsiders : 20ft – 40ft – 45ft



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Accessory Addon by GavriiL_ES v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Accessory Addon by GavriiL_ES v1.0 ETS2

Hello everyone, and welcome to the page for my new mod, which adds accessories to our favorite game, Euro Truck Simulator 2. This is the first version of the mod, and I plan to continue working on it to eventually include everything needed to create both a business and a homey atmosphere in a truck cabin.
Compatibility: 1.50



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Bengans Swedish Islands Map v0.1 ETS2
item.description:
Bengans Swedish Islands Map v0.1 ETS2

Changes 1.51-0.1
Update for 1.51..
Done from work, might have bugs, or issues
Hence Alpha, will be updated to release once tested

Map addon of the Swedish Islands Gotland and Öland
Located at the east coast of Sweden. 16 new “cities”
Added for you to deliver to/from!

It should be compatible with any map that hasn’t modified
sectors in the very vicinity of the city Kalmar.

All the map DLC’s for ETS2 are needed!
Compatibility: 1.51

You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder.
